# The Formulae of Master Gebr (Level 20 Alchemist)
## Overview
*These four cloth-bound books are neatly printed—as with a printing press or some other form of mechanical transcription—with a title page, a table of contents, and a useful cross-referenced index. They have been treated well and are clearly reference works, rather than laboratory notes; the writer was obviously a most disciplined and focused inventor.*

**Protection** The cover is treated with tears of death poison (contact; *save* Fort DC 22; *onset* 1 minute; *frequency* 1/ minute for 6 minutes; *effect* 1d6 Con damage and [[Paralyzed|paralyzed]] for 1 minute).

**Value** 6,500 gp (11,000 gp with the preparation ritual)

**Formula**

6th—*[[Elemental Body III (Spell)|elemental body III]]*, *[[Form of the Dragon I (Spell)|form of the dragon I]]*, *[[Heal (Skill)|heal]]*, *[[Shadow Walk (Spell)|shadow walk]]*, *[[Transformation (Spell)|transformation]]*, *[[Twin Form (Spell)|twin form]]*

5th—*[[Delayed Consumption (Spell)|delayed consumption]]*, *[[Dream (Domain)|dream]]*, *[[Elude Time (Spell)|elude time]]*, *[[Nightmare (Spell)|nightmare]]*, *[[Overland Flight (Spell)|overland flight]]*, *[[Resurgent Transformation (Spell)|resurgent transformation]]*, *[[Spell Resistance (Spell)|spell resistance]]*

4th—*[[Detonate (Spell)|detonate]]*, *[[Dragon's Breath (Spell)|dragon’s breath]]*, *[[Fire Shield (Spell)|fire shield]]*, *[[Fluid Form (Spell)|fluid form]]*, *[[Invisibility, Greater (Spell)|greater invisibility]]*, *[[Neutralize Poison (Spell)|neutralize poison]]*, *[[Stoneskin (Spell)|stoneskin]]*, *[[Universal Formula (Spell)|universal formula]]*

3rd—*[[Absorbing Touch (Spell)|absorbing touch]]*, *[[Amplify Elixir (Spell)|amplify elixir]]*, *[[Bloodhound (Spell)|bloodhound]]*, *[[Displacement (Spell)|displacement]]*, *[[Draconic Reservoir (Spell)|draconic reservoir]]*, *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]*, *[[Heroism (Spell)|heroism]]*, *[[Seek Thoughts (Spell)|seek thoughts]]*, *[[Thorn Body (Spell)|thorn body]]*

2nd—*[[Alchemical Allocation (Spell)|alchemical allocation]]*, *[[Barkskin (Spell)|barkskin]]*, *[[Bull's Strength (Spell)|bull’s strength]]*, *[[Cat's Grace (Spell)|cat’s grace]]*, *[[Elemental Touch (Spell)|elemental touch]]*, *[[Fire Breath, Greater (Spell)|greater fire breath]]*, *[[Perceive Cues (Spell)|perceive cues]]*, *[[See Invisibility (Spell)|see invisibility]]*, *[[Transmute Potion to Poison (Spell)|transmute potion to poison]]*, *[[Vomit Swarm (Spell)|vomit swarm]]*

1st—*[[Bomber's Eye (Spell)|bomber’s eye]]*, *[[Comprehend Languages (Spell)|comprehend languages]]*, *[[Crafter's Fortune (Spell)|crafter’s fortune]]*, *[[Disguise Self (Spell)|disguise self]]*, *[[Endure Elements (Spell)|endure elements]]*, *[[Keen Senses (Spell)|keen senses]]*, *[[Negate Aroma (Spell)|negate aroma]]*, *[[Shield (Spell)|shield]]*, *[[Stone Fist (Spell)|stone fist]]*, *[[Touch of the Sea (Spell)|touch of the sea]]*

**Preparation Ritual**

**Spontaneous Bomb (Su)** When it comes to bombs, you have a special trick up your sleeve. Once per day as a swift action, you can apply a discovery that you qualify for (but do not already know) to a bomb. This does not allow you to stack non-stacking discoveries on a bomb.

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 125
